name: RRoll!
description:
RRoll! is a high speed tunnel runner. Race through endless pipes and don't crash the treacherous obstacles. Experience the adrenaline rush of racing endlessly in a spiraling tunnel full of deadly obstacles. Easy to play but hard to get a good highscore!

Start your run with just one tap on the screen and be amazed by enhanced visuals, experience incredible thrills as you race through the RRoll! world.
